attributes.comment:
Two members of our family are in the process of adopting a child outside of the United States. This
process is very expensive and very long. Documents expire in the meantime and have to be
redone, which adds to the cost. I feel it is grossly unfair to raise fees for United States citizens who
are trying to better a child's life and theirs. The long international adoption process takes its toll on
those warm-hearted people who are involved in it. Please do not make their lives more difficult by
raising fees. Anything you can do to make this process easier, not harder, is most appreciated.
Thank you.
Judith Stanhope

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Judith E. Stanhope
